pages.text: The Fatigued Talisman provides a 25% damage increase while the player is effected with mining fatigue.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_epic)Epic Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_negative)Force of Negative$(/l).
